pageTitle: Mount Lebanon 15228 Pittsburgh, PA Neighborhood Profile
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {10657=Mount Lebanon real estate is primarily made up of medium sized (three or four bedroom) to large (four, five or more bedroom) single-family homes and apartment complexes/high-rise apartments. Most of the residential real estate is owner occupied. Many of the residences in the Mount Lebanon neighborhood are older, well-established, built between 1940 and 1969. A number of residences were also built between 1970 and 1999.}
